synopsis.text: Kaho's reluctance to attend high school paves the way for her 25-year-old cousin, Hana Natori, to step in and take her place. With striking resemblance and a kind-hearted nature, Hana anticipates a smooth transition into high school life. However, her plans are quickly thwarted when her former classmate, Okito Kanie, now a history teacher at the school, uncovers her secret. Instead of exposing her, Kanie decides to give Hana a special lesson, marking the beginning of an unexpected journey filled with surprises and challenges.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
